# load library
```{r}
library(scVascularAnalysis)
```

# Load raw counts
```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)

data <- read.csv('../data/scp_raw_counts.csv.gz')
metadata <- read.csv('../data/scp_fibroblasts_metadata.csv')
metadata <- metadata[-1,]
rownames(metadata) <- metadata[,1]
metadata <- metadata[,-1]
  

object <- CreateSeuratObject(data, meta.data = metadata)

saveRDS(object, file = '../objects/object_raw.rds')
```
